media:group.media:title: Who Was Athanasius?
media:group.media:description:
Athanasius was one of the most important and influential fathers of the Christian Church. He attended the Council of Nicaea and defended the Nicene Creed. But who was Athanasius? This short video will tell you. 

Books by Athanasius:
‘On the Incarnation’: http://amzn.to/2fUphI3 

Biographies of Athanasius:
Khaled Anatolios, ‘Athanasius’:  http://amzn.to/2gicd07 
Peter Leithart, ‘Athanasius’: http://amzn.to/2gWhcDu 

Best books on Nicaea:
Khaled Anatolios, ‘Retrieving Nicaea’: http://amzn.to/2fUqi2t 
Lewis Ayers, ‘Nicaea and its Legacy’: http://amzn.to/2gPFv9O 

Ryan M. Reeves (PhD Cambridge) is Assistant Professor of Historical Theology at Gordon-Conwell Theological Seminary.  Twitter: https://twitter.com/RyanMReeves       Instagram: https://instagram.com/ryreeves4/

Ryan's Blog: https://blogs.thegospelcoalition.org/ryanreeves/
